Home > Worthopedia–Price Guide > Toys, Dolls, Games&Puzzles > Lego Custom Fast Food Restaurant for Town, Train, City Terms and Conditions for using our site
Lego Custom Fast Food Restaurant for Town, Train, City 2 Sold For: or Sign In to see what it's worth. Sold Date: 04/10/2010 Channel: Online Auction Source: eBay Category: Toys, Dolls, Games&Puzzles
CustomLego ® Town Builder Shop Brick Burger Fast Food Chain Extra, Extra: Well known Lego® Modeler brings his unique, Custom Models to e ba y in 2010* *SPECIAL TOWN BUILDER SETS NOW UP FOR SALE!* CLICK H ER E FOR MORE AUCTIONS IN MY STORE ! You are bidding on a Custom Minifig Scale, Fast Food Chain! Description: "Welcome to BrickBurger, Home of the BrickBurger, Can I take your order?" It's the world famous BrickBurger Fast Food chain and they are rapidly expanding in a Lego City near you! Stop in for a sizzling burger, hot fries and an ice cold drink! Once your citizens have had a BrickBurger, they'll never eat another circle shaped burger again! Things to know This is NOT a Lego ® Production model. This is custom built with no Instructions Building is Modular, roof is removable with detailed interior All Pieces purchased new just for this model. Includes 2 Lego® Minifigures with new "American" style baseball caps, two tables of food, a grill, and a soda fountain! Fully Constructed on 5 x 10 inch Lego ® Base Plate Additional Info: Building is "modular" (roof separates like Cafe Corner!) The Shop is sold As-Is; shrink wrapped and fully assembled for security Some parts may be packed disassembled for shipping but will included a copy of jpeg instructions to rebuild the parts disassembled No INSTRUCTIONS for this Set I will be happy to answer any questions so please ASK QUESTIONS BEFORE BUYING OR BIDDING PAYMENT Payment is due within 3 days after auction has ended. If you require invoice I will send to you upon request or automatically 24 hours before final day to pay. To be fair to serious bidders, if winner does not pay after 3 days, Non Paying Buyer on this auction is automatically reported to Ebay. At this time, I can only accept PayPal (!) SHIPPING I ship Monday thru Friday (no Saturday and Sunday). I can ship International, email me for quote before buying (approximate weight is 4 kg). Sorry, cannot ship toys to Italy from U.S. 2010 will be a Great year for my Custom Items so check me out each week for new listings! Contact me if you have any questions. Good luck and ! (image above is not included in this auction) Warning: Toy Contains small parts. Not for children under 3 years LEGO® is a trademark of the LEGO Group of companies which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this auction.
